'''Radiant Spincrystal 139''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock a [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Makani 'olu'olu]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in the ''Underground Lava River: Lower Level'' in [[Toyac Springs]], accessible during the {{Quest|Tracer No Tracing}}.
